name: Classic White T-Shirt
description: A timeless essential, this classic white t-shirt is crafted from soft, breathable cotton. It features a relaxed fit and reinforced stitching for durability, making it perfect for layering or wearing on its own for a clean, casual look.

name: Slim Fit Jeans
description: These slim fit jeans are designed with a modern silhouette that hugs the legs without feeling restrictive. Made from a premium denim blend with a hint of stretch, they provide exceptional comfort and retain their shape wear after wear.

name: Denim Jacket
description: Our classic denim jacket is a versatile wardrobe staple. It features a button-up front, multiple pockets, and a slightly faded wash for a lived-in look. Perfect for layering over tees, shirts, or hoodies in any season.

name: Hooded Sweatshirt
description: Stay cozy and stylish with this hooded sweatshirt made from ultra-soft fleece. It has a spacious front pocket, adjustable drawstring hood, and ribbed cuffs and hem. Ideal for casual outings or relaxing at home.

name: Chino Shorts
description: Perfect for warm weather, these chino shorts offer a classic fit and lightweight comfort. Crafted from breathable cotton twill with subtle stretch, they feature side pockets and a tailored waistband for a polished yet relaxed look.

name: Floral Print Dress
description: This feminine floral print dress is designed with a flattering A-line silhouette that gently drapes over the body. Made from a soft, flowy fabric, it features delicate ruffle details and a tie waist, making it perfect for brunch dates or garden parties.

name: Wool Overcoat
description: Elevate your outerwear collection with this sophisticated wool overcoat. Tailored for a sleek fit, it features a classic notch lapel, button closure, and smooth lining for easy layering over suits or casual outfits during cooler months.

name: Athletic Joggers
description: Our athletic joggers combine performance and comfort with a modern tapered fit. Made from moisture-wicking fabric, they feature an elastic waistband with drawcord, zippered pockets, and ribbed cuffs, perfect for workouts or casual days.
